description: In this session, I will briefly discuss the following topics: How the cryptocurrency ecosystem operates, Cryptocurrency airdrops and various incidents related to them, On-chain data analysis based on real-world data using Python, Other ways to contribute to the cryptocurrency ecosystem with Python

related_urls.label: 험난한 암호화폐 세상을 여행하려는 Python 유저를 위한 안내서 - 이왕원 [PyCon.KR 2024]

title: 험난한 암호화폐 세상을 여행하려는 Python 유저를 위한 안내서 - 이왕원 [PyCon.KR 2024]
